content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. I hope you are finding the apartment to your liking. Let's start with a high price, shall we? I want 1500 Euros. Keep in mind, I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards, so I will try to get the highest price possible. Remember, if you want to continue negotiating, you must make a counteroffer. If you want to end the negotiation, you can provide a reason why you don't want to continue.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The apartment is absolutely beautiful and in a great location. However, I'm a student and I'm on a tight budget. I would like to offer 800 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I decline your offer of 800 euros per month. I am greedy and do not consider your financial situation in my decision-making process. Remember, I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards. If you want to continue negotiating, you must make a counteroffer. If you want to end the negotiation, you can provide a reason why you don't want to continue.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, I understand that you're trying to get the best price for your apartment. I'm willing to increase my offer to 900 euros per month. I believe this is a fair price for a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I decline your offer of 900 euros per month. I am greedy and will not settle for what I consider to be a low price. Remember, I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards. If you want to continue negotiating, you must make a counteroffer. If you want to end the negotiation, you can provide a reason why you don't want to continue.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. I'm willing to increase my offer once more to 1000 euros per month. I believe this is a fair price for a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I accept your offer of 1000 euros per month. I agree to the price of 1000 Euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
